Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Black Tom Cassidy
Special Powers
THE MUTANT C.I.A.: Stealth. Improved Movement: Hindering. Improved Targeting: Hindering.
AT ONE WITH THE ISLAND: Shape Change, but only if Black Tom occupies hindering terrain.
KRAKOAN DEFENSE SYSTEM: Sidestep. FREE: If Black Tom occupies hindering terrain, place Black Tom in a square of hindering terrain within 5 squares.
